description: Selects all button elements and elements of type button.
selects: all button elements and elements of type button whose class is "class-name"

description: Selects all options of select elements that are selected.
selects: All options of select elements with class "class-name" that are currently selected

selects: All checkboxes, radio buttons and options of select elements with class "class-name" that are currently checked or selected

description: Selects the element that is currently focused.
